## ContractDeployer.deployVote() method

Deploys a new Vote contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deployVote(metadata: VoteContractDeployMetadata, chain?: ChainIdOrName): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  metadata | [VoteContractDeployMetadata](./sdk.votecontractdeploymetadata.md) | the contract metadata |
|  chain | ChainIdOrName | <i>(Optional)</i> the chain to deploy the contract to, defaults to the chain the SDK is connected to |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;string&gt;

the address of the deployed contract

## Remarks

Deploys an Vote contract and returns the address of the deployed contract

## Example


```javascript
const contractAddress = await sdk.deployer.deployVote({
  name: "My Vote",
  primary_sale_recipient: "your-address",
  voting_token_address: "your-token-contract-address",
});
```
